size_estimation.reasoning: Based on shirt-to-jeans ratio and shoulder width

gpt_advice:
Product Description:
This casual outfit features a silver shirt with a white jeans combination, perfect for a stylish and comfortable look. The colors of silver, white, and gray add a touch of elegance to your wardrobe. The recommended size for this outfit is M, based on the shirt-to-jeans ratio and shoulder width.

Outfit Suggestion:
For a chic and effortless look, pair the silver shirt with the white jeans. Complete the outfit with a pair of silver sneakers or sandals for a modern twist. Add some silver or white accessories to complement the color palette.

Social Media Caption:
"Channeling casual chic vibes with this silver and white outfit combo. Perfect for a day out or a casual hangout with friends. #CasualStyle #SilverAndWhite #FashionGoals"
